title: anyk
author: anyk
content: Dear Respected Users,Hotbit is scheduled to list HEVC(Hybrid Electric Vehicle Coin) on Global Section.Deposit function launches at: 2022.06.10  05:00 AM UTCTrading function launches at: 2022.06.10  07:00 AM UTCWithdrawal function launches at: 2022.06.10  07:00 AM UTCTrading Pair: HEVC/USDT 【Hotbit users exclusively enjoy “Minus Maker Means Minus Transaction Fee” mechanism. By placing and settling any maker order, the user will enjoy 0 transaction fee and an extra 0.30% of the trading volume of his/her maker order as reward on Global Section!】 Project Name: Hybrid Electric Vehicle CoinAbbreviation: HEVCProject Introduction:HEVC will be an electric vehicle that get cryptocurrency by incorporating blockchain into the automobile industry.Token type: BEP-20Total supply: 3,000,000,000 HEVCOfficial Website: http://hevc.site/ Explorer: https://bscscan.com/token/0x969eCC05150724987F1c8CCa76b500BA26EE7f94  Risk warningThe investment on cryptocurrency projects is subject to high market risks.Please make your investments cautiously. Hotbit will make best efforts to choose the cryptocurrency projects with high quality,but Hotbit will not be responsible for any of your investment losses.Thank you for your support！Yours trulyHotbit Team  About us ：Hotbit’s Official Website： https://www.hotbit.io/ Telegram ： https://t.me/Hotbit_English Twitter： https://twitter.com/Hotbit_news Facebook：  https://www.facebook.com/hotbitexchange/Medium： https://medium.com/@hotbitInstagram：https://www.instagram.com/hotbit_official/Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Hotbit_Official/
